itemData.name: Swift Nether Drake
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Swift Nether Drake
Binds when picked up
Unique
Requires Level 70
Requires Riding (300)
Use: Teaches you how to summon this mount. Can only be summoned in Outland or Northrend. This is an extremely fast mount.
1 Charge
